resource.chars:
There is a mistake of ye presse in ye Transactions of February, wch I 
desire you would be pleased to put into ye <u>Errata <\u> of some of 
yor next Transact, if you have an opportunity. My 2d Letter 
in yt Transact. beares Mr Wrays name, wch is some 
confusion, if ye reader shall not well heed it.
I am 
Sr yor most humble servant 
Martin Lister
